course_description: Professional Development is led by Goizueta's Graduate Career Management Center. The objective of this course to prepare Full-time MBA students for the MBA job search and provide the tools needed to successfully manage future career transitions. The course covers the fundamental skills needs for the MBA recruiting process, including effective networking, company research, and interview practice.
